english.segment1: Shoulder to the wheel. For someone else's selfish gain. Here there is no choosing. Working the clay. Wearing their anger like a ball and chain.
english.segment2: Fire in the field. Underneath a blazing sun. But soon the sun was faded. And freedom was a song. I heard them singing when the day was done. Singing to the holy one.
english.segment3: Lead me on. Lead me on. To a place where the river runs. Into your keeping, oh.
english.segment4: Lead me on. Lead me on. The awaited deliverance. Comforts the seeking..lead on.
english.segment5: Waiting for the train. Labelled with a golden star. Heavy hearted boarding. Whispers in the dark. "where are we going--is it very far? "
english.segment6: Bitter cold terrain. Echoes of a slamming door. In chambers made for sleeping, forever. Voices like thunder in a mighty roar. Cry to the lord.
english.segment7: Lead me on. Lead me on. To a place where the river runs. Into your keeping, oh.
english.segment8: Lead me on. Lead me on. The awaited deliverance. Comforts the seeking..lead on.
english.segment9: Man hurts man. Time and time, time again. And we drown in the wake of our power. Somebody tell me why.
english.segment10: Lead me on. Lead me on. To a place where the river runs. Into your keeping, oh.
english.segment11: Lead me on. Lead me on. The awaited deliverance. Comforts the seeking..lead on.
english.segment12: Lead me on. Lead me on. To a place where the river runs. Into your keeping, oh.
english.segment13: Lead me on. Lead me on. The awaited deliverance. Comforts the seeking..lead on.
